ms_copies_score: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.558 'Mese di Maggio 1788. Quartetto per due violini, viola, e violoncello composto da Luigi Boccherini Professor di musica all' atual servizio di S.M.C. e compositor di camera di S.M. Prussiana'. Copy made in Berlin for Frederick William II from the lost autograph manuscript score sent by Boccherini.
sources.first_edition: 1798, Paris, Pleyel: Op. 39 no. 6 (Book 2 no. 3; for title and comment, see No. 234)
sources.modern_edition: 1952, Kassel, Bärenreiter: Op. 41 (separate parts; revised by Walter Upmeyer), no. 3 in L. Boccherini Ausgewählte Streichquartette
arrangements: Of the second movement, as part of a quartet (no. 3) for flute, clarinet, horn and bassoon, by O. Van den Broek, c. 1810 (see No. 262)

entries.notes: For comment, see note to previous number.
